articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Give a picture of me and an idea of this project
articles.contents:
About me
Hey! My name is Zuhair. I live in Canada and go to Iroquois Ridge High School. I love to code, play video games and sports. In 2021, I’m going to 10th grade. This course really interested me and I loved the outcome of it. I really do recommend it but only if you are ready to have lots of work and you are dedicated. You aren’t going to like this course if you aren’t doing those things. In my opinion, I loved this course. And I hope future students enjoy it too!
About my Project
Have you ever thought about how movies have so many genres and how they might not be true? Others have thought the same thing. I was also curious about it so I decided to gather data and compose a graph to prove or disprove this. Hope you like the graph and if you have any questions about it, please let me know.

articles.title: Most Used Movie Genres
articles.description: Which one genre do you think is most used?
articles.contents:
Summary
Viewing the graph, it shows the Drama genre is the most used genre in Movie and TV shows. Using the table, you can see the exact number of movies and TV shows for each genre. The table shows that drama has around 300,000 movies and TV shows. The next most used genre is comedy at around 250,000 movies and TV shows. This concludes that producers don’t use the same genres for everything. This also brings closure to what is the most popular genre of movies and TV shows.

articles.title: Sources
articles.description: An overview of the source used in my project
articles.contents: In the website, there are a few different versions of this data set. The one I used was title.basics.tsv.gz. This is the data set with the different genres. The other ones don’t have the different genres for the movies.
